Package com.tofik.coolexoplayer.exoplayer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExoCreator  
    MediaSourceBuilder  
    Playable
    Define an interface to control a playback, specific for SimpleExoPlayer and PlayerView.
    Playable.EventListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseMeter<T extends com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.BandwidthMeter>
    Abstract the DefaultBandwidthMeter, provide a wider use.
    Config
    Necessary configuration for ExoCreator to produces SimpleExoPlayer and MediaSource.
    Config.Builder  
    CoolExo
    Global helper class to manage ExoCreator and SimpleExoPlayer instances.
    CoolExoPlayer
    A custom SimpleExoPlayer that also notify the change of Volume.
    CoolPlayerHelper
    General definition of a helper class for a specific CoolPlayer.
    DefaultExoCreator
    Usage: use this as-it or inheritance.
    ExoPlayable
    Making Playable extensible.
    ExoPlayerDispatcher  
    ExoPlayerViewHelper
    An implementation of CoolPlayerHelper where the actual Player is an ExoPlayer implementation.
    Playable.DefaultEventListener
    Default empty implementation
    Playable.EventListeners
    List of EventListener
